original_title: Nuwan Bopage places deposit to contest Presidential Election
original_body_lines: Attorney-at-Law Nuwan Bopage, the presidential candidate of the People’s Struggle Movement (Jana Aragala Viyaparaya), has officially placed his deposit to contest in the upcoming Presidential Election.
The deposit was made at the Election Commission this morning (13) by Dharmasiri Lankapeli, an executive committee member of the party, on behalf of Nuwan Bopage.
